alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 6:11AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Across Southern Brevard, Indian River and Saint Lucie Counties Through Early This Morning... Surface observations and roadway cameras show areas of fog have expanded from southern Brevard County into Indian River and Saint Lucie counties early this morning. Locally dense fog will continue to occur across this region, producing visibilities of a half mile or less. Any fog should diminish by 9 AM this morning. Motorists should be alert for rapidly changing visibilities from fog, especially along I-95 from Melbourne southward through Fort Pierce. When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use only low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
